column5: Wow, emailed them 25 minutes ago with pictures of my ripped seat in my new flip over and they have just replied saying they are sending me a new seat!  IMPRESSED!
You get what you pay for! They are awesome huts! I hope to find one for a deal at the end of this season.  S.
Perfect, i just picked up the Otter XT Cabin a couple weeks ago...........glad to hear this story  May even get some ice made down here this week to get out and christen it
